game.model

Class ChessLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • game.model.ChessLogic

  • public class ChessLogic
extends java.util.Observable
    A class defining the logic around the chess game and different moves.

    2013-02-25
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame(Player p1,
                Player p2)
        Method defining the start of a new game.

        Inputs can be two players, and if the second player is chosen as computer the game will feature an AI making the Black moves.

        Parameters:
        p1 - Player playing white.
        p2 - Player playing black.

      • computerMove

        private void computerMove()
                   throws UnrealPieceException
        Makes a move for the computer player. Uses AI to get the best possible move. Then calls the move() method to carry out the move.

        If none of the moves are valid, the computer surrenders.

        Checks for check mate at the end of the move.

        Throws:
        UnrealPieceException

      • getTurn

        public int getTurn()
        A method to check the current turn.
        Returns:
        Returns an integer corresponding to the color that can move now.

      • nextTurn

        private void nextTurn()
               throws UnrealPieceException
        Swaps the current turn, from black to white or vice versa. If game is being played against a computer player, a call is made to computerMove().
        Throws:
        UnrealPieceException

      • move

        public boolean move(java.awt.Point startPoint,
           java.awt.Point endPoint)
             throws UnrealPieceException
        The method for carrying out a Chess move.

        Makes checks for current turn and possible moves. Validates the move by calling the validateMove() method.

        If the move is made to kill the king, check mate is set. Pawns that have crossed the board are turned into queens.

        Adds killed pieces to the rubbish and calls nextTurn().

        Parameters:
        startPoint - Where the move is made from.
        endPoint - To where the move is made.
        Throws:
        UnrealPieceException - Thrown when the moved piece is not a registered piece.

      • validateMove

        private boolean validateMove(java.awt.Point startPoint,
                   java.awt.Point endPoint,
                   int piece)
                      throws UnrealPieceException
        A method for validating moves.

        Matches the move to a list of valid moves for the specified piece and movement.

        Parameters:
        startPoint - The start tile.
        endPoint - The end tile.
        piece - The piece that want to move.
        Returns:
        Whether the move is valid or not.
        Throws:
        UnrealPieceException - Thrown when the moved piece is not a registered piece

        public java.lang.String printBoard()

        public MoveStrategy getStrategy(int piece)

        Parameters:
        piece -
        Returns:
        A new instance of the corresponding movestrategy

      • checkMate

        public int checkMate()
        A method to get who put the other player in check mate.
        Returns:
        Identity of person having checkmated the other

      • gameOver
